Package com.mygdx.pirategame.pathfinding.pathManager

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PathManager
    Used to manage a type of pathing that a ship can have
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttackPath
    Class used for pathing an AI ship to attack a target
    PatrolPath
    This class is used to manage the pathing of a ship while it is not targeting a specific entity
    RandomPath
    Generates random paths for ships and randomly paths between them Used for ships without an assigned college
    WaitingPath
    Superclass used for all pathing managers which are in a passive state waiting for a ship to come into range to attack This class will switch to an attacking pathing manager if within range of an enemy
